name: Let's build an app using Bravo + Figma
description:
Join us at an interactive workshop using Bravo Studio and Figma to make an app using no code! Karla will be showing us how to build a simple blog app using Bravo, Figma, and Airtable. Bravo Studio is an app-building platform that turns your designs into native mobile apps.

​​This workshop will also feature a fun design challenge with prizes! Details will be dropping soon in our Discord community.


​🐰 About our speaker

​Karla is a UX/UI & Digital Product Designer who creates custom products that solve problems. She has designed, built, tested, and published 12 Apps on the App Store and Google Play Store as a Bravo Expert.


​Karla has started to advise students 3 years ago through Udacity and Interaction Design Foundation (IDF). As of now, she has trained dozens of students mainly in North America, Europe, and Asia. She continues to mentor 1: 1 weekly SpringBoard students from Introduction to Design to UX/UI Design.


​She has created Pratika & Vitamina K, a program created to help people bring their ideas to the market. The program teaches you the fundamentals of problem-solving through Design Sprint, uses real cases to show an overview of the possibilities, and provides the no-code tools necessary to bring products to life.
